Brent Stirton bụ onye isi na-ese foto maka ihe gbasara Getty Images, nke dị na New York
A maara ọrụ ya na-enweta ihe nrite n'ọtụtụ ebe màkà ngosipụta dị ike nke nsogbu ndị metụtara esemokwu, ahụike na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
Stirton bụ ọkachamara n'ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ụzọ ọzọ ọ na-esi eme foto, gụnyere foto ọkụ n'ọhịa, na ọrụ ya
Ọ na-eme njem nkezi ọnwa itoolu n'afọ, na-arụ ọrụ naanị na ọrụ a gwara ya.

Ọrụ Stirton pụtara na Newsweek, National Geographic, CNN Traveler, The New York Times Magazine, The Washington Post Magazine, The Sunday Times Magazine, Le Monde 2, GQ, Geo na ọtụtụ aha mba ụwa ndị ọzọ a na-akwanyere ùgwù
Ọ na-edekwa blọọgụ màkà Discovery Channel.
N'ịrụ ọrụ iji kọwaa akụkọ, Stirton na ndị nta akụkọ si n'akwụkwọ ndị na-eduga n'ụwa na-arụkọ ọrụ

N'ime afọ abụọ gara aga, ya na ndị CNN bụ Christiane Amanpour na Anderson Cooper na-arụkọ ọrụ ógè niile n'isiokwu ndị dị ka ọdachi tsunami ma ọ bụ okpukpe, na-achịkọta ihe ngosi banyere ihe omume akụkọ okpomọkụ nke a na-ekwupụta ma na-agbasa.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu màkà ọrụ ebere gụnyere HIV / AIDS, gburugburu ebe obibi, ịda ogbenye, esemokwu na mgbake mgbe esemokwu gasịrị, na nsogbu inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Stirton na-arụ ọrụ ógè niile màkà Global Business Coalition megide AIDS na The Global Fund megide AIDS, Tuberculosis na Malaria
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ọhịa maka nkwado màkà The World Wide Fund for Nature, na-agbapụ mkpọsa zuru ụwa ọnụ na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị mmadụ na gburugburu ha
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ màkà Ford Foundation na Clinton Foundation.
Stirton enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu màkà ọrụ ya, gụnyere onyinye asaá site na World Press Photo Foundation; n'afọ 2007 a kpọtụrụ ya aha dị ka onye na-ese foto na PopPhoto Magazine
Stirton nwere akara ugo mmụta na akwụkwọ akụkọ site n'obodo ya bụ South Africa, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-ese foto gbasara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.
